name: Al Maajid
description: Al Maajid is one of the names of Allah in Islam, translating to 'The Glorious' or 'The Majestic.' It signifies the greatness of Allah's attributes and His exalted nature.
summary: The name Al Maajid emphasizes the glory and majesty of Allah. It highlights His honor and the reverence He commands in the hearts of believers. The origin of this name comes from the Arabic root related to honor and magnificence, reflecting the Islamic belief in Allah's supremacy and grandeur in all aspects of existence.
